LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoHigh.stages.0.label: smooth and mild
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoHigh.stages.0.description: That cigarette was just what I needed, such a smooth flavor.
LanguageData.VBE_DeluxeTobaccoHigh.stages.0.label: puffing on luxury
LanguageData.VBE_DeluxeTobaccoHigh.stages.0.descripti: A cigar makes me feel like I’ve made it big in life.
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoWithdrawal.stages.1.label: tobacco withdrawal
LanguageData.VBE_TobaccoWithdrawal.stages.1.descripti: I really wish I could smoke. I'd kill for a cigarette.
